Purpose: Normal jobs, similar to Lochness “public” access
Rules: SU charges based on node type (see partitions table above), jobs can be preempted by high QoS enqueued jobs
jobs can be preempted by high or standard QoS enqueued jobs
Highest Priority Jobs, no SU Charges.

Purpose: Intended for debugging and testing jobs
Rules: No SU Charges, maximum 4 CPUs are allowed, must be used with `--partition=debug`
